name: UIDropSession
desc: The interface for querying a drop session about its state and associated drag items.

items.name: var localDragSession: UIDragSession?
items.desc: The drag session that corresponds to this drop session, for in-app drag activities.

items.name: func loadObjects(ofClass: NSItemProviderReading.Type, completion: ([NSItemProviderReading]) -> Void) -> Progress
items.desc: Creates and loads a new instance of the specified class for each drag item in the session.

items.name: var progressIndicatorStyle: UIDropSessionProgressIndicatorStyle
items.desc: The drop-progress indicator style associated with the drop session.
